overview: What's it like to truly lose control? In NakedSword's Addict, urge goes into overdrive as men push the line between attraction and addiction. With an aesthetic both experimental and groundbreaking, Addict is a sexual dreamscape, turning porn's hottest bodies into works of art. Addict is unlike anything you've seen before, and like nothing you'll ever forget. But be careful: when sex is this powerful it only takes a taste to get hooked.
title: Addict
